Name: Blue Passion
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
30 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice. If serving over cubed ice use this recipe: 1½ light white rum, ¾ blue curaçao, ¾ lime juice and ½ sugar syrup.
Review: Sweet and sour and turquoise blue.
Nutrition: One serving of Blue Passion contains 216 calories
